original_text: And his kinsmen by their clans, when the genealogy of their generations was recorded: the chief, Jeiel, and Zechariah,
korean_text: 그의 형제가 종족과 계보대로 우두머리 된 자는 여이엘과 스가랴와

sentences.original_text: And his kinsmen by their clans,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 친척들은 그들의 족속에 따라,

sentences.original_text: when the genealogy of their generations was recorded:
